name: @stormkit/api
description: Official API library for Stormkit applications

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git add . && git commit -m 'Bump version'
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git add . && git commit -m 'Bump version'
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git add . && git commit -m 'Bump version'

author: @stormkit-io
